attributes.action: Stop charging staff, patients and visitors, for using UK Hospital car parks.
attributes.additional_details:
Health tourism is getting worse in the UK.
How can we allow foreigners that have paid nothing into the NHS, to receive treatment free of charge, whilst we fleece our own subjects of what is often their household money that they need to live?
attributes.background:
Car parks are crucial to anyone entering a Hospital.
Doctors, Nurses and all staff, work day and night to save us.
Families of patients, in a state of distress, use the Hospitals during all hours to be with their loved ones.
We must stop charging them now!

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/176356
